title: #069 - 1 Year of the Podcast & Lessons Learned
itunes:title: #069 - 1 Year of the Podcast & Lessons Learned
description:
We're celebrating the one year anniversary of the podcast today! Can you believe it? Here are a couple of awesome ways we're celebrating:

  • We made a page filled with lessons, announcements, book recommendations and even a giveaway! Go check it out here.
  • We're also so excited to share with you our new donation project, where you can help us with podcast production costs and with helping out the Orangutans.
